text: Sredi etikh veruyushchikh yest' takiye lyudi, kotoryye obeshchali Allakhu stoyko srazhat'sya vmeste s prorokom i byli pravdivy v svoyom obete, dannom Allakhu. Sredi nikh yest' i takiye, kotoryye ispolnili obet i imeli chest' past' v bor'be za islamskuyu veru, i yest' takiye, kotoryye ostalis' v zhivykh, ozhidaya, chto podobnaya chest' ne minuyet i ikh, i oni ni v koyey mere ne izmenili dogovoru s Allakhom
